messages.title: Rod Cantrill - The real remain candidate
messages.content: With stopping Brexit as our priority, Rod is the only candidate for you... Time for a brighter future with the Liberal Democrats.

messages.title: Your Choice is Clear
messages.content: Rod Cantrill & the Lib Dems, fighting to stop Brexit OR Labour, who want to force through a Labour Brexit?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Rod and the Liberal Democrats have fought to stop Brexit and will continue to lead the fight to keep the UK in the heart of Europe.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting intention in Cambridge, YouGov (October 2019), Rod 39%, Lab 30%, Grn 12%, Con 10%. Labour, Green and Conservative voters are lending Rod their vote this time.

issues.brexitEurope: Pro-Europe voters here in Cambridge cannot find a better and credible candidate who can stop Brexit. Rod and the Liberal Democrats have fought to stop Brexit.
issues.health: I’m backing Rod because he’s 100% committed to tackling the climate crisis and understands the severity of the issue. As a fellow businessman, I know Rod understands how to invest more in Britain's mental health. He’ll be a huge champion for our NHS.

community.content: Liberal Democrats are more credible than Labour in England - Cambridge is no different. We ask all pro-Europe voters here in Cambridge to back Rod.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE
